SEARCH
Package repository

Class EnquiryRepository

Object
EnquiryRepository
public class EnquiryRepository extends Object
Represents a repository for storing and managing enquiries This class provides method to retrive, add and query enquiries stored in the repository
Since:
25/11/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

  • Method Details

    • getListOfEnquiries

      public static ArrayList<Enquiry> getListOfEnquiries()
      Gets the list of enquiries stored in the repository Enquiries are read from a CSV file and returned as a list
      Returns:
      The list of enquiries

    • addEnquiryToRepo

      public static void addEnquiryToRepo(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds a new enquiry to the repository
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to be added

    • getEnquiriesBySender

      public static List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesBySender(String senderID)
      Gets a list of enquiries sent by a specific sender
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the sender
      Returns:
      The list of enquiries sent by the specified sender

    • getPendingEnquiry

      public static Enquiry getPendingEnquiry(String campName)
      Gets the pending enquiry for a specific camp, if any
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp
      Returns:
      The pending enquiry for the specified camp, or null if none

    • hasPendingEnquiries

      public static boolean hasPendingEnquiries(String campName)
      Check if there are pending enquiries for a specific camp
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp
      Returns:
      True if there are pending enquiries for the specified camp, false otherwise

    • getEnquiriesByCamp

      public static ArrayList<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByCamp(Camp camp)
      Gets a list of enquiries related to a specific camp
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp for which enquiries are retrieved
      Returns:
      The list of enquiries related to the specified camp
